title: New Poppy
body:
Hello

With the new poppy rework it is evident and stated that she should be building some tank later game and what not. I am not a fan of tanks or bruisers and really liked Poppy since she could be a hyper carry and i personally found that extremely fun, as well as her design being awesome. Anyway would i be open to justifiable bans if i play her as a hyper carry even if its not optimal and i am potentially losing my team the game since other champs would fit that role a lot better. I understand the fact the whole game is about winning with 'fun' somewhat taking a backseat to it but I wasn't really up for getting back into league except for the Poppy remake.

Thanks in advance

Oh and sorry if this is in the wrong board.
